ca.ualberta.appfive

Class BookDisplayActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.appfive.BookDisplayActivity

  • public class BookDisplayActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    This activity displays a book and all of it's data. The mode will control the view the user has of the book and the options to edit it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BOOK_DISPLAY_MODE_KEY
      Key for storing the mode of how the book should be displayed
      static int DISPLAY_AVAILABLE_MODE
      The mode for showing a book that the user can bid on uses Booklist
      static int DISPLAY_BIDED_MODE
      The mode for showing a book that the user has bid on uses Booklist
      static int DISPLAY_BORROWED_MODE
      The mode for showing a borrowed item to borrower uses BookList
      static int DISPLAY_EDIT_MODE
      The mode for allowing the user to view and possibly edit/delete the book if not borrowed uses myBookList
      static int DISPLAY_OWNER_BORROWED_MODE
      The mode for allowing the user to view the book if borrowed uses MyBookList
